front.title: The XML Enabled Directory: Schema Operational Attributes

abstract.t: This document defines additional subschema operational attributes for the XML Enabled Directory (XED) that allow user-defined directory attribute syntaxes to be imported into a directory server. User defined syntaxes specified in XML Schema, RELAX NG or Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1), or specified as XML document type definition (DTD) element type declarations, are supported.
